h1_title: How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3
content: After defeating the Captain, you’ll be able to capture his Spirit, which will actually go into your inventory under Key Items. Now that you have the Spirit, the purple seals on the cells will automatically be unlocked.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Open_the_Purple_Seal_Prison_Doors_in_the_Pagoda_Realm.md', within the main section titled 'How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3'.
The content is as follows:
After defeating the Captain, you’ll be able to capture his Spirit, which will actually go into your inventory under Key Items. Now that you have the Spirit, the purple seals on the cells will automatically be unlocked.
